# concatenating(_:)

**Instance Method**

Returns a transform that’s constructed by concatenating two existing scaled poses.

## Declaration

```swift
func concatenating(_ transform: ScaledPose3DFloat) -> ScaledPose3DFloat
```

## Parameters

- **transform**: The second scaled pose.
title: concatenating(_:)
